title: Connecting Bug?
body: I was going into a game like every other player but when i reached like 90% on the loading screen it suddenly went black, so i said Okay and pressed the reconnect button. Normal stuff until it reached 50% then it just blacked screen and back to the reconnect . okay i reconnected like 10 times already , and it wouldnt let me reconnect, what my friend said to me ( we were on discord ) told me to Repair the client , and that still didnt work after that it prompted the Leaver Buster , that shit is bullshit have witnesses to tell you i wasn't  lying on anything we were all in discord when this happened can you atleast do something about this this is bullshit , it wouldn't let me reconnect and i get Leaver Buster

replies.body:
Regardless of your intent, not connecting to a match negatively impacts *everyone in the match*. This is a key reason why leaves/disconnections are all treated equally and why we cannot modify or remove penalties for any reason.

This issue is commonly caused by a poor connection to the League servers, so I'd recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local settings are compatible with League.

Let me know if these steps caused any change.
